content: these mini baskets are knit from the top down in the round on 2 dpns the handle is made by knotting the cast on end to its opposite side to get the lovely woven look without the pesky purl stitches simply turn your basket inside out the pattern is very quick it only has 5 rounds > **praise for 10 min mini basket** > > it s very easy great pattern really > does take 10 minutes > elemenopeo 1 > > so cute mirihi 2 > > quick little basket bonewoman 3 > > this is a cute little basket it is > great for my gnomes and made very > fast omissi 4 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/elemenopeo/10-min-mini-basket 2 https //www ravelry com/projects/mirihi/10-min-mini-basket 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/bonewoman/10-min-mini-basket 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/omissi/10-min-mini-basket
